title: CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE
content:
0xFDE8F069C542D1260x234C1AE9// CellCamActivate
void CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE(BOOL active, BOOL bGoFirstPerson);Parameters:active: Toggle whether the camera should be active.bGoFirstPerson: Unused parameter.Activates the cellphone camera. Make sure you have a mobile phone created with CREATE_MOBILE_PHONE or else the camera will not work.
codeBlocks:
// CellCamActivate
void CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE(BOOL active, BOOL bGoFirstPerson);

-- Example usage for CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE
CellCamActivate(false, false)
